attributes.action: Put a minimum age on the internet 18 at least preferably 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children in schools should be taught to use text books in Infants, Junior and first part of comprehensive school.  That's what school should be all about!!! They should not even know what the internet is until 18.  This is why it's so easy for paedophiles to come online when young children are in chatrooms.
